column3: ) the neckbone gravy which was really good
column4: the milk braised pork shoulder which was awesome
column5: and the serrano ham on grilled bread and a duck egg which was the ultimate disappointment. I have never eaten such a salty dish in my life. And it wasn't the ham
column6: it was the seemingly fistful of rocksalt sprinkled over the egg. I couldn't eat it and my girlfriend
column7: who's kind of picky and took forever for me to convince to try a duck egg beforehand
column8: looked at me like I was crazy.
